column2: In the days of yore Canada is said to have controlled territory from the Atlantic to the Pacific, uniting disparate lands under a common identity. In the days since the event however many of these lands have unfortunately fallen into the hands of heathens and those who would deny the greatness of Canada. With the dominionist community unified it has been decided that Canada should once more cover such a territory. It is the destiny of Canada to stretch from sea to sea!
